title: Multi.io
description: Multi is a margin-first Cryptocurrency exchange, built out of frustration with the lack of products, no user-centric development and transparency.
details: Write an e2e cypress test for authentication and exchange features.

title: Turncoin.io
description: TheXchange™ is a people-driven platform that helps individuals achieve their dreams while giving their fans a vehicle to support them and share in their success. Backing people by leveraging Blockchain technology. TheXchange™ provides the vehicle to pursue their heart’s desire - wherever they live in the world if they have talent, passion and the will to fight for a purpose-filled life. TurnCoin™ is a Mega-Security Token for TheXchange™ platform. This turncoin.io website is for marketing TurnCoin™ and for managing buying TurnCoin™ orders.
details: Implement the turncoin.io marketing landing page(AntD, React, Less, ReactRouter).
Implement the turncoin.io admin pages for users, news, events, orders, assets management(React, Redux, Redux-Saga, AntD).
Write rich-featured action creators and corresponding reducers.
Use Fetch API to call Rest APIs to fetch data and update the states in the store of Redux.
Involve in the design and development of Rest APIs and services to interact with a data storage layer.(Node.js, Express.js, MySQL, SequelizeORM).
Deploy the turncoin.io secure Rest APIs server using Nginx, Let's Encrypt and SSH on AWS EC2.
Use Draft.js rich text editor framework for news WYSIWYG.
Build several responsive email templates for order notifications.
Use SendGrid email service to send notification emails.
Work with Github and CircleCI continuous deployment environment.

title: SHENYANG LIMOND INDUSTRIAL CO., LTD ERP
description: Participated in SHENYANG LIMOND INDUSTRIAL CO., LTD ERP development.
details: Analyze business requirements to translate functional requirements into technical specifications.
Develop human resources module in Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) for this company.
Implement the business logic with a PHP CodeIgniter framework.
Write unit test code to ensure the system.
Use AJAX not to reload pages.
